name: Gardens of a New World
description:
My game for Haunted PS1 Madvent Calendar 2021, and a sequel to Artists of a Dead World.

The residents of the dead world slowly stumble out of their dying reality and into a new strange one. However, this world is simply a limbo. A place between realms. You may stay for as long as you'd like, there are quite a few things to find. But eventually we all must reach our destination, right?

No secret endings this time.

Credits in the zip.
